name: Willands tomb - construct project
description:
Your a investigator looking for a lost professor.  After finding his camp you realize he has not been here in a long time. looking around the area you came across a glyph covered rune that knocked you out and when you awoke you are in a cavern and a corpse is found nearby.

  This is a short game due to bumpy roads but I hope that you see the effort that went into this game having to almost recreate everything twice.

Have a wonderful adventure!
